title: Gross Gus and the Time Out Chair
description: Book 4- Gross Gus Series  Your child will laugh while following Gus's antics in Kindergarten class. Why does Gus spend so much time sitting on the Time Out Chair?  Does he learn his lesson? Find out what mischief Gus gets in to at school and what happens when he breaks the rules? Click the LOOK INSIDE feature above to get a sneak preview! Check the other Gross Gus books in the series Book 1- Gross Gus Book 2- Gross Gus's Rotten Christmas Book 3- Gross Gus and Enormous Ellie   (Children's Book) Gross Gus and the TIME OUT Chair (Illustrated Picture Book for ages 3-8) Teaches your Child the value of Cooperation- Beginner Readers/Bedtime Story/Social Skills
author: Kally Mayer
